CustomField.formula: CASE(text(Status), "A iniciar", IMAGE("/resource/HDEGreenDot", "Green"), "Aguardando", IMAGE("/resource/HDEGrayDot", "Gray"), "Em Andamento", IMAGE("/resource/HDEYellowDot", "Yellow"), "Atenção", IMAGE("/resource/HDERedDot", "Red"), "Crítico", IMAGE("/resource/HDEBlackDot", "Black"), "Closed", IMAGE("/img/msg_icons/confirm24.png", "Check"),"")
CustomField.label: Tratamento
